title: Roasted Broccoli with Yummi Nuts Mix of Seeds
ingredients: 1 ½ pound broccoli cut into the same size florets
The juice of half a lemon
1 bag of Yummi Nuts Mix of Seeds
instructions: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 425º F.
Step 2: Mix all the ingredients except the Yummi Nuts and Parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Step 3: Place on a previously greased baking sheet and bake for 16 to 20 minutes.
Step 4: Add the Parmesan cheese and Yummi Nuts, stir and serve.
